Hi all - 

Being sooooooo quiet out here these days, thought I'd mention the upcoming Tampa show and to see who will be there this year. Being a "buyer's market" these days, it will be interesting to see what will be put out on tables this year! Myself, I hope to sell off a few nicer items at all the shows this year -- not quite sure what just yet -- but really wish I was in the "buying" mode more than "raising funds" mode. 

I hope to carry down some books this year -- definitely copies of our 2006 Kokusai Tosogu Kai exhibition catalogue, priced to sell. People always enjoy books. Hope you guys and gals stop by my table and say hello!

Whatever, I'm sure there will be some exciting treasures begging for new ownership in Tampa. Always a well-attended show, I'm sure it will be a fun weekend! 

Ron
STL
